item.title: What to Know About Cataracts and Cataract Surgery
item.description: <p><span>Hi @JudithC375026, here to help clarify. The $16 per year AARP membership cost does not include insurance of any kind, as AARP is not an insurance provider. There is a monthly cost for all insurance programs through AARP partners, just as there is with any type of insurance. AARP MyVision Care provided by EyeMed offers 3 vision plans designed exclusively for AARP members. Plans include diabetic vision exams every six months, plus loss of sight benefits. You can view information, plans and pricing for AARP Vision Insurance provided by EyeMed here: <a href="https://aarp.info/3kKwVaA" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noreferrer">https://aarp.info/3kKwVaA</a> or call EyeMed at 1-844-243-4584. I hope this helps.</span></p> -- SOURCE: http://www.aarp.org/health/conditions-treatments/info-2019/cataracts-eye-disorder.html

item.title: The Future of Work Is Here
item.description: <p> Why is it that with Trump launching an all-out attack on Social Security, AARP presents us with articles on Pandemic Pets and initiatives to keep us all working until packed off the job site on a stretcher? Social Security and Medicare are of critical importance to older Americans, yet there is no leadership from any quarter -- AARP included -- to organize a defense of these programs. AARP is an obvious place to get out the word about this. But if they no longer have an interest in this, then I won't be renewing my membership. </p> -- SOURCE: http://www.aarp.org/politics-society/advocacy/info-2020/jenkins-supporting-multigenerational-workforces.html

item.title: Can I have my Medicare premiums deducted from my Social Security payments?
item.description: <p>I've been paying Medicare premiums manually every 3 months, since I'm not drawing SS yet. When I begin drawing SS and the Medicare B premium is deducted from my monthly SS check, is the deducted premium for the previous, current or next month?</p> -- SOURCE: http://www.aarp.org/retirement/social-security/questions-answers/medicare-premiums-deducted-ss.html

item.title: Will White House Orders Bring Coronavirus Relief to Families?
item.description: <p><a vocab="http://schema.org" typeof="Person" rel="nofollow noreferrer" resource="acct:95930228@aarp.fyre.co" data-lf-handle="" data-lf-provider="livefyre" property="url" target="_blank" class="fyre-mention fyre-mention-livefyre">@<span property="name">GailM287645</span></a> The employee payroll taxes will be deferred until Dec 31. The Secretary of the Treasury is instructed to explore a way to eliminate the deferred taxes. (See Sec. 4). Only Congress can eliminate the tax per the Social Security Act of 1935, Title XI, Sec. 1104.</p><p>When Obama reduced the SS tax by 2% for 2 years, the lost SS funding was replaced with funds from the General Tax Fund by Congress. Same thing will probably happen this time.</p><p>The employers will have to still pay their portion of the payroll taxes. The second Congressional stimulus bill, The CARES Act, authorized deferred employer payroll tax payments until Dec 31, or they have the option to continue paying them as scheduled. Trump's memorandum brought the employee payroll tax deferment in-line with the employer deferment already authorized by Congress.</p><p><a href="https://www.whitehouse.gov/presidential-actions/memorandum-deferring-payroll-tax-obligations-light-ongoing-covid-19-disaster/" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noreferrer">https://www.whitehouse.gov/presidential-actions/memorandum-deferring-payroll-tax-obligations-light-ongoing-covid-19-disaster/</a><br/></p> -- SOURCE: http://www.aarp.org/politics-society/advocacy/info-2020/coronavirus-executive-orders.html

item.title: Frank Abagnale Will Catch You If You Scam
item.description: <p>Frank;</p><p><br/></p><p>They got me! Damn! Am I pissed. </p><p><br/></p><p>My credit card with UAL was compromised 3 - 4 months ago. They closed the compromised card and issued me a new one. I have been going through the monthly statement looking for the recurring vendors - cell phone, internet, etc. - and advising them of the old card being cancelled and the new car. I was having trouble getting the Apple 99 cent cloud storage thing taken care of and thought, "I'll wait 'till it bounces, Apple will send me an email and I'll take care of it then." Well, today i rep'd an email, purportedly from Apple - hey, it looked perfect - advising me my 'payment method' didn't work. So, I clicked on the website, which took me to an Apple site. Then I clicked on continue and provided the new credit card information, address, etc. clicked on 'continue' went to another Apple-looking official web site, asked a few more questions, asked for my social - I thought that was a bit unusual, but, it said it was for verification, so I entered it. Then when I clicked 'send', I noticed the URL didn't look official like Apple would look.</p><p><br/></p><p>I called Apple, spoke with them, she asked for the URL, I read it to her and my suspicions were proved correct. This was a phishing expedition. Now I've spent the entire afternoon installing credit freezes on the 3 credit sites, cancelled the new card, I'm getting a new one sent to me. But, they have my social! Agh! What else do I need to do?</p><p><br/></p><p>I can send you the phishing email if you'd like it to include in your classes if you'd like.</p><p><br/></p><p>Romeo</p> -- SOURCE: http://www.aarp.org/money/scams-fraud/info-2016/frank-abagnale-will-catch-you-if-you-scam.html

item.title: Will White House Orders Bring Coronavirus Relief to Families?
item.description: <p>The bullshitometer is in the red zone! </p><p>Does anybody understand that Trump's executive orders do nothing but support the rich and to hell with the middle class and underprivileged? </p><p>It's also why he is doing nothing about the pandemic. He's just biding his time and hoping the virus will wipe out the blacks, the Latinos, the native Americans all on its own without him having to lift a finger. </p><p>Get real people!<br/></p> -- SOURCE: http://www.aarp.org/politics-society/advocacy/info-2020/coronavirus-executive-orders.html

item.title: The 2020 Census: Make Sure You’re Counted
item.description: <p>How does Publishers Clearing House work? You can enter to Best Ways to Win With Publishers Clearing House contests online, by phone and by mail.</p><p><a href="https://www.sweepstakesnew.com/pch-sweepstakes" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noreferrer">https://www.sweepstakesnew.com/pch-sweepstakes</a><br/></p> -- SOURCE: http://www.aarp.org/politics-society/advocacy/info-2020/jenkins-census-deadline.html

item.title: Get Tax Help Now
item.description: <p>I recently filed an amended return with turbo tax. It would appear the IRS has not viewed it yet as they are billing me per original return. My amendment shows a refund. My question is whether I should pay and wait or not pay and wait. Turbo tax offers no help along these lines of questioning.</p> -- SOURCE: http://www.aarp.org/money/budgeting-saving/info-02-2010/get_tax_help_now.html

item.title: AARP Poll Finds Near-Universal Support for Social Security After 85 Years
item.description: <p><a vocab="http://schema.org" typeof="Person" rel="nofollow noreferrer" resource="acct:89513765@aarp.fyre.co" data-lf-handle="" data-lf-provider="livefyre" property="url" target="_blank" class="fyre-mention fyre-mention-livefyre">@<span property="name">ms2841838</span></a> <a vocab="http://schema.org" typeof="Person" rel="nofollow noreferrer" resource="acct:18660711@aarp.fyre.co" data-lf-handle="" data-lf-provider="livefyre" property="url" target="_blank" class="fyre-mention fyre-mention-livefyre">@<span property="name">MilVet</span></a> "IF Trump hadn't jumped in early with both feet....... What country are you living in. You obviously are totally clueless to the fact that he did NOT do anything when he should have as soon we realized the virus as now in the US and that ground zero it was an attorney from New Rochelle had NOT traveled anywhere was diagnosed with the virus. From there, an funeral he attended three weeks before, they tested them and they were infected. Even the man who drove him to the hospital when he had trouble breathing then also tested positive for Covid. <br/><br/>And your ignorance is on the same level as Trump. Did you not read the story of a man and his wife in theirs 60s who blindly took Trumps (who is NOT a doctor) and took hydroxchloriquine and died within two days and his wife almost died. All because they took the advice of Trump about that drug while all infectious experts said it was not true and NOT to take that drug.<br/><br/>You are full of you know what. Nobody recovered taking that drug. I wondered what type of people voted for Trump in the first place and continued to blindly praise him for his handling of the virus.<br/><br/>Meanwhile his count is down bc more than 80% of the country feels that he failed largely in how he did NOT handle the virus thus blood his on his hands.<br/><br/>You are not even intelligent and apparently are just a cult member of the orange man, and thus do no research of your own and just blindly believe what he says. It's sad that you do not have the maturity or intelligence to do research than posting that remark.<br/><br/>This is for Trump and his continued group of supporters (when the majority percentage of people blame him for the number of people that died)<br/><br/>IT IS BETTER TO BE QUIET AND APPEAR IGNORANT, THAN POST A COMMENT OR OPEN YOUR MOUTH AND REMOVE ALL DOUBT. <br/><br/>He will be gone in November. Even states that the Republics have always won are now turning away from Trump and voting for Biden. HE WILL BE GONE SOON ENOUGH. </p><p><br/></p> -- SOURCE: http://www.aarp.org/retirement/social-security/info-2020/aarp-poll-finds-near-universal-support.html

item.title: Will White House Orders Bring Coronavirus Relief to Families?
item.description: <p><a vocab="http://schema.org" typeof="Person" rel="nofollow noreferrer" resource="acct:19280882@aarp.fyre.co" data-lf-handle="" data-lf-provider="livefyre" property="url" target="_blank" class="fyre-mention fyre-mention-livefyre">@<span property="name">radfox59</span></a> The CARES Act, the last stimulus bill, gave employers the option to defer their portion of the FICA taxes through the end of this year. They have until Dec 31, 2021 to pay back the first 50% and until Dec 31, 2022 to pay back the second 50%. Two full years. I can't imagine Congress would institute a payback schedule that was more beneficial to employers than employees. More likely, it will be like the 2011-2012 2% SS payroll tax holiday Obama-Biden did and Congress will pay the lost SS income to the SS Trust from the General Tax Fund. Last time it was $215 Billion from the General Fund to the SS Trust Fund for the 2 years of reduced taxes.</p> -- SOURCE: http://www.aarp.org/politics-society/advocacy/info-2020/coronavirus-executive-orders.html

item.title: Court Orders Minnesota to Ease Absentee Voting Rules
item.description: <p>AARP read our comments.. We do NOT support mass mailing votes. <strong>Absentee voting ONLY when requested by the VOTER,</strong> Mass mailing voting is wide open for fraud, this is a proven fact. Does AARP support fraud??</p><p>The DEMS wants this because there is no way in hell the mailed in votes can be validated in a timely manner and they can't win any other way. </p><p><br/></p><p>Remember the DEMS are not happy that the common man (that would be us) rejected their promises and agendas in 2016. and now the DEMS promises, agendas, and threats for 2020 are more extreme. </p> -- SOURCE: http://www.aarp.org/politics-society/government-elections/info-2020/minnesota-absentee-voting-rules.html

item.title: Scammers Lurk Behind Area Code 876
item.description: <p>I received a call from JM Kingston (876-277-5621), which is about the third call, stating that I won Millions of Dollars but they need me TO PAY for receipt of the money. I screamed at him saying that I DO NOT WANT THEIR MONEY and to stop calling me!!! Even though I am on Disability and do not receive a lot of money, I do not support these bad people trying to take advantage of poor people. 🤨</p> -- SOURCE: http://www.aarp.org/money/scams-fraud/info-09-2012/beware-area-code-876-nh1788.html

item.title: Taking Blood Pressure Medication at Night May Protect Your Heart
item.description: <p><span>To make the treatment successful, taking medication on the recommended time by a doctor is best. Everyone’s body responds differently, therefore fixing time your own for taking high blood pressure or any other medication is not advisable. Your doctor can suggest the best timeframe for taking medicine to get the best result. Enapril 5 mg is a prescription medicine for treating high blood pressure and heart failure. At time doctor also prescribe this drug after a heart attack treatment. Enapril 5 mg also lowers the chances of having a heart attack or stroke. For getting high blood pressure medicines at discounted price I will suggest reliablerxpharamcy.com</span></p> -- SOURCE: http://www.aarp.org/health/conditions-treatments/info-2019/blood-pressure-medication-bedtime.html

item.description: <p>AARP THANK YOU FOR ALL THE VALUABLE INFORMATION THAT YOU SHARE EACH DAY THROUGHOUT THE WORLD AND TO YOUR MEMBERSHIP. GG</p> -- SOURCE: http://www.aarp.org/politics-society/advocacy/info-2020/jenkins-supporting-multigenerational-workforces.html

item.title: What Is the IRS Timeline for Sending Stimulus Checks?
item.description: <p>Because they are individual business they pay every 3 months and Federal government, Alabama, and Puerto Rico receive their 2018 and 2019 taxes.<br/></p> -- SOURCE: http://www.aarp.org/money/taxes/info-2020/irs-timeline-to-send-stimulus-funds.html

item.title: How to Beat the Grandparent Scam
item.description: <p>My father got a phone call from a number 888 200 5551 and told him that his grandson was in an accident and broke his nose and got stitches and was in jail. and then a lawyer called him 607 325 3024 said he would need to send 7400 to get outta jail my dad immediately called me to ask if i heard anything about this i told him it was a scam...</p> -- SOURCE: http://www.aarp.org/money/scams-fraud/info-2016/how-to-beat-grandparent-scam.html

item.title: 15 Spring and Backyard Cleaning Tips
item.description: <p>This is a wonderful article it's worth a time to read. During spring it tends to rain a lot so make sure all water is going through your gutters instead of going everywhere, it may also give you a worse during winter, ice dams forming on weak and broken gutters it causes problem and havoc on other parts of your home. Luckily there are professional like <a href="https://www.fairfaxvagutterservices.com/" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noreferrer">https://www.fairfaxvagutterservices.com/</a> that can help your gutter repair or installation needs.</p> -- SOURCE: http://www.aarp.org/home-family/your-home/info-2016/spring-and-backyard-cleaning-tips.html

item.title: The 2020 Census: Make Sure You’re Counted
item.description: <p>How does Publishers Clearing House work? You can enter to &lt;a href="<a href="https://www.sweepstakesnew.com/pch-sweepstakes/" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noreferrer">https://www.sweepstakesnew.com/pch-sweepstakes/</a>"&gt;Best Ways to Win With Publishers Clearing House&lt;/a&gt; contests online, by phone and by mail.</p> -- SOURCE: http://www.aarp.org/politics-society/advocacy/info-2020/jenkins-census-deadline.html

item.title: How to Report Consumer Fraud
item.description: <p>Received a text: Hello Carolyn, this is Ben from Fedex. I've tried to deliver your item twice, but to no avail. Can you please schedule here; 68hdai.com/TwRIwTn938. </p><p>The phone #1(213) 472-6227...a high alert fraud # BESIDES I LIVE IN MONTANA AND THIS IS A CALIFORNIA #</p><p><br/></p> -- SOURCE: http://www.aarp.org/money/scams-fraud/info-2016/how-to-report-fraud-file-complaints.html

item.title: 15 Spring and Backyard Cleaning Tips
item.description: <p>I am really late on doing my spring cleaning and so I am going to try and clean out my gutters this week. I think that I will just get up on the roof with a hose and spray all of the debris down the downspouts that way. However, what can I do about keeping debris out of my gutters in the future? <a href="http://clintonseamlessguttering.com/gutter-services" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noreferrer">http://clintonseamlessguttering.com/gutter-services</a> <a href="http://clintonseamlessguttering.com/gutter-services" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noreferrer">http://clintonseamlessguttering.com/gutter-services</a></p> -- SOURCE: http://www.aarp.org/home-family/your-home/info-2016/spring-and-backyard-cleaning-tips.html

I'm sure any amount is appreciated.</p> -- SOURCE: http://www.aarp.org/politics-society/advocacy/info-2020/coronavirus-executive-orders.html

item.title: Study Ranks the Best and Worst Materials for Face Masks
item.description: <p>Whoever is in charge of the website content should enhance the staff with experienced researchers able to pre-screen any proposed articles touching on scientific topics. This article is not worthy of publishing/posting as presented here. I can only suppose that the source of the mask review was not particularly credible or the conclusion spang from someone looking up a variety of mask articles and mixing and matching them together to get a story. </p><p><br/></p><p>Thank you to the commenter that posted the original source of this "Health - Conditions and Treatment" Article - I am reading that next.</p><p><br/></p><p>Fiasco.</p><p><br/></p><p>An article withdrawal and correction before a reposting is in order. CHS</p><p><br/></p> -- SOURCE: http://www.aarp.org/health/conditions-treatments/info-2020/face-masks-ranked.html
